message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. Given its high value and significance, I understand it might seem substantial at first glance. However, considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $10800 for this exceptional item. This represents a 10% discount off the original price, making it an attractive opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a favorable rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success. Kind regards, Alice
